Rainy_Day_0: I like watching the rain fall from our windows.$n#$b#It's so peaceful.
Rainy_Day_1: Today is a perfect day to snuggle in a warm blanket and read a good book!$6
Rainy_Day_2: I wanted to go out and see Gunther today but the rain makes me want to stay inside all day instead...$s
Rainy_Day_3: It's raining again.$n#$b#If you plan on going out, don't forget to take a raincoat!$b#I don't want you to get sick!
Rainy_Day_4: I wonder if it rains in the desert too...#$b#I kind of want to walk there myself to check!$h
Rainy_Night_0: The trees look all nice and clean outside!#$b#It makes me feel very refreshed.$b#Do you feel it too, @?
Rainy_Night_1: I finished my book today.#$b#Why don't we cuddle in bed and I'll tell you all about it?$6
Rainy_Night_2: Did you have a good day despite the rain, sweetie?
Rainy_Night_3: Why don't you give me you wet clothes and I'll hang them to dry?

Indoor_Day_4: Don't forget to eat a full breakfast, sweetie!#$b#You need a lot of energy working around the farm!
Indoor_Night_0: Did you have a nice day, sweetie?

Indoor_Night_2: You look tired, sweetie.#$b#Don't forget to take some rest every once in a while, okay?
Indoor_Night_3: I did a lot of work around the house today!$h#$b#I'm doing my best not to be a burden for you.
Indoor_Night_4: I had a long talk on the phone with my brother today.$h#$b#He says hi.$6
Outdoor_0: The sun woke me up, so I decided to get some fresh air.#$b#I hope I didn't wake you, @!

Outdoor_2: Do you have a lot of work to do today?#$e#Me?$7#$b#I'm just gonna enjoy our beautiful farm.

Outdoor_4: You still look half asleep, @!$h#$b#Are you sure you don't want to stay in bed for a little while more?
OneKid_0: I can't believe we have a kid!$h#$b#I don't think I have ever been that happy!$h

OneKid_3: I hope %kid1 didn't wake you up last night.$6#$b#The crying was very loud... I took care of it though.
TwoKids_0: Now that we have %kid2, I feel like my life is finally complete!$4
TwoKids_1: You won't believe what %kid1 said to %kid2 today!$h#$b#It was adorable!
TwoKids_2: I love reading to our children!$h#$b#I hope they will come to like books as much as I do.

Good_0: @!#$b#I just wanted to tell you that I love you.$4
Good_1: I know that look!$4#$b#You want a kiss, don't you?$6
Good_2: Sometimes, I think about everything that has happened to me, and I thank every god there ever existed that I met you.
